item.title: Constrained Games
item.description: Constraints in mobile games are everywhere. And they are so explicit. I have no idea why people voluntary accept constraints. Maybe because there are “opportunities” available around the constraints. Somebody has to make a game where number of opportunities is decreacing all the time. To observe the influence.
